name: Drawing game (Joonas Sariola)
description:
Drawing game made for Android devices (in landscape mode). Memorize green colored shape as well as you can in 10 seconds. After that move white colored cube using joystick on left side of screen. White cube leaves behind blue colored ink that will count as your scores.

Features:

  • In-game tutorial (can be skipped)
  • Four (4) pictures, each one you can get up to 100 points
  • No need to be perfect with your drawings, as long as blue ink touches green area's corner it will be counted as a success :)
  • After all pictures you're score is count together and you will get up to five (5) starts based on performance.
  • Estimated playthrough five (5) minutes.
  • Size: 21.7MB
  • As you can see from main menu logo my goal is to become coder, not art creator :')

Plausible future update(s):

  • Plausability to draw into screen with your finger instead of moving with joystick
  • Adjust drawing speed
